returns.usdcReturned: Total USDC (principal + yield) sent to recipient

currentValue(uint256).notice: Current USDC value of `poolId`'s position (principal + yield).

deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit `amount` USDC on behalf of `poolId`.         Caller must have already transferred USDC to this contract, OR         this contract must be approved to pull from ArenaManager.

withdraw(uint256,address).notice: Redeem all shares for `poolId` and return USDC to `recipient`.
